reviewText: Anna shows you step by step how to make wonderful vegan meals at home.  If your thinking about trying the vegan lifestyle you should pickup this video.
Anna is a wonderful cook and teacher.  The recipes prepared are delicious!  I learned so much from this DVD, I wish there were more so I can continue to expand my vegan cooking skills.
Really liked this dvd. Learned a lot and looking forward to trying the recipes. Very easy to watch. Anna explained as she went along.

As I watched this video I was asking myself questions about ingredients etc.  As I asked myself these questions, I found they were answered clearly within a short time of my thought.  A very thorough, informative, DVD on Vegan cooking; and since I have tried several of the recipes already I can say delicious.  Look forward to the next one.

I was thinking of going vegan and picked up this DVD and Anna Maria made everything look so easy to make and the final results were so pleasing to the eye.  I wish there were more video's out there so clear on a subject.
